alert.note: Alert for Cass; Richland (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 22 at 10:06PM CDT until April 22 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Clay County in northwestern Minnesota... Northwestern Wilkin County in west central Minnesota... Southeastern Cass County in southeastern North Dakota... North central Richland County in southeastern North Dakota... * Until 1100 PM CDT. * At 1004 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Wolverton, or 19 miles south of Fargo, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Comstock around 1015 PM CDT. Oxbow and Hickson around 1020 PM CDT. Wild Rice around 1035 PM CDT. Sabin and Horace around 1040 PM CDT. Fargo and Moorhead around 1100 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Moorhead Airport. This includes the following highways... Interstate 29 between mile markers 44 and 71. Interstate 94 in North Dakota between mile markers 344 and 352. Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 1 and 11. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
